text: Nuns on the Run is a 1990 British criminal comedy movie directed by Jonathan Lynn and starring Eric Idle, Robbie Coltrane, Janet Suzman, Camille Coduri, Robert Patterson, Doris Hare, Lila Kaye. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * Category:1990 crime movies Category:1990 comedy movies Category:1990s criminal comedy movies Category:British criminal comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Jonathan Lynn
title: Nuns on the Run
